markdownRemark.html: A tag designed for Magento 2 software to enable simpler and more flexible user interface (UI) rendering. The goals of the UI component system include the following: • Simplifying Layout Handle XML files • Moving Magneto Admin user interface elements from HTML+Javascript to a “pure javascript” custom widget system • Enabling the creation of more complex UI components out of smaller components • Pre-rendering data for UI components as JSON, binding closely to Magento backend data objects • Using AJAX to update component data • Introducing a new DSL for creating all of the above
